flawed_nl_solution:
The bugs ate enough plants for there to be 30-20=<<30-20=20>>20 left.
They were still full and only ate half, leaving 20/2=<<20/2=10>>10 plants left.
Later on, the bugs only ate 1 more which left 10-1=<<10-1=9>>9 plants in the garden.
#### 9

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 10, not 20. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
